data.text:
@BTD_brett (3/3) A decision will be made once all of the required information has been thoroughly evaluated by Health Canada.
  
 As the review is still ongoing, it is not possible to predict when a regulatory decision will be made.

@BTD_brett (2/3) Timing for the completion of Health Canada’s review depends on many factors, including but not limited to, the need for additional data, discussions with the sponsor, and requirements for updates to safety information.

@BTD_brett (1/3) Health Canada received a submission from Vaccigen Ltd. to authorize the COVAXIN COVID-19 vaccine on June 30, 2021. Health Canada reviews vaccine applications through an independent process and authorizes products based on scientific rigour and medical evidence.
@GovCanHealth China hide the truth and spread the virus since 2019

@GovCanHealth I know many people who have severe heart problems after the booster.Check the hospitals and see who is hospitalized now.Majority is the C19"vaccinated"
By the way bad photo ad.The woman seems to be holding her heart as is she is in pain.

@GovCanHealth @MBGov Even with 3 shots you’ll still get Covid because anyone can get it 

Haven’t seen any stats on adverse effects of the vaccine yet. You think that there might be somebody that felt sick after taking it.

@fikc27 @GovCanHealth I can give you the survival rate by age groups for BC 
by population and cases if you are truly intrested
